name: RangeSort
description: Manages sorting operations on Range objects.

info.title: Office JavaScript Add-in API
info.description: Office JavaScript Add-in API for June fork

methods.name: apply
methods.signature: apply(fields: SortField[, matchCase: [Optional, hasHeaders: [Optional, orientation: [Optional, method: [Optional)

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The list of conditions to sort on.

parameters.name: matchCase
parameters.description: Whether to have the casing impact string ordering.

parameters.name: hasHeaders
parameters.description: Whether the range has a header.

parameters.name: orientation
parameters.description: Whether the operation is sorting rows or columns.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The ordering method used for Chinese characters.
